title: Autonomous Multi-Modal Chemical Tomography using Bayesian Optimization
content: Determining the complete chemical arrangment of matter in three dimensions is fundamental for engineering novel nanomaterials [1]. Measuring the 3D volumetric chemistry at high resolution can be achieved by fusing elastic and inelastic scattering signals [2]. Data fusion, as opposed to traditional correlation, recovers new information and improves accuracy by linking separate signal modalities [3-5].
